body: : At 3rd level, you gain cold resistance 5 and a +1 natural armor bonus to AC. At 9th level, your cold resistance increases to 10 and natural armor bonus increases to +2. At 15th level, your natural armor bonus increases to +4.
name: Leathery Skin
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ghouls/New Rules/Ghoul Sorcerer Bloodline/Ghoul/Bloodline Powers/Leathery Skin
